title: Open World Orchestral RPG Music Pack
description: Create an immersive game world with the Open World Orchestral RPG Music Pack - 22 epic tracks of battle, exploration, and ambient themes to bring your RPG game to life.
longDescription:
Music Pack Demo:

Youtube

Soundcloud

Immerse your players in an epic adventure with the Open World Orchestral RPG Music Pack. With 22 original tracks, including 17 unique compositions and 5 alternate versions of some of the main tracks, this pack provides a diverse range of soundscapes and moods for your RPG game. From soaring strings and brass to haunting choirs and ethereal bells, each track has been crafted with care to transport your players to a world of fantasy and wonder. With a mix of battle themes, exploration themes, and ambient themes, this pack has everything you need to bring your RPG game to life.​
